evidence.claim: GCPay operates on multiple cloud platforms including AWS and GCP, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their secure payment processing solutions.
They utilize X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in their payment processing solutions.
GCPay supports FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability in financial transactions.

icp.icp_reason: GCPay focuses on payment management, not healthcare data exchange or X12 transactions.
